item.title: Hart Consumer Products Recalls Nailers Due to Injury Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Walmart
item.description: The contact sensor on the nailer can malfunction and involuntarily discharge a nail, posing a risk of serious injury to the user or bystanders.
item.dc:creator: Hart Consumer Products Recalls Nailers Due to Injury Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Walmart

item.title: ABUS Recalls Youth Helmets Due to Risk of Head Injury
item.description: The recalled helmets do not comply with the U.S. CPSC federal safety standard for bicycle helmets, posing a risk of head injury.
item.dc:creator: ABUS Recalls Youth Helmets Due to Risk of Head Injury

item.title: Backyard Play Systems Recalls Playsets with Wooden Roof Due to Entrapment Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The wooden parts used to reinforce and create a decorative gable design on the wooden roof pose an entrapment hazard to children. Children can become trapped in the gap between the lower part of the roof structure and the bottom of the gable decoration.
item.dc:creator: Backyard Play Systems Recalls Playsets with Wooden Roof Due to Entrapment Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: Kubota Recalls Utility Vehicles Due to Crash and Injury Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The floor mats on the recalled Kubota utility vehicles can warp or degrade and interfere with the throttle pedal, posing crash and injury hazards.
item.dc:creator: Kubota Recalls Utility Vehicles Due to Crash and Injury Hazards (Recall Alert)

item.title: Usines Giant Factories Recalls Gas Water Heaters with Emerson Control Valves Due to Risk of Carbon Monoxide Poisoning
item.description: The heater’s Emerson control valves can fail to close properly, causing soot to accumulate on the burner, posing a risk of carbon monoxide poisoning to consumers.
item.dc:creator: Usines Giant Factories Recalls Gas Water Heaters with Emerson Control Valves Due to Risk of Carbon Monoxide Poisoning

item.title: Power Handles Recalled Due to Fire and Burn Hazards; Manufactured by Elektron Music Machines
item.description: The power handle can short circuit and overheat, posing fire and burn hazards
item.dc:creator: Power Handles Recalled Due to Fire and Burn Hazards; Manufactured by Elektron Music Machines

item.title: Walmart Recalls Better Homes and Gardens Essential Oil Infused Aromatherapy Room Spray with Gemstones Due to Rare and Dangerous Bacteria; Two Deaths Investigated
item.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has confirmed that bacteria in a recalled aromatherapy room spray in a Georgia melioidosis patient’s home genetically matches the bacterial strains in the patient, and three other patients in Kansas, Minnesota, and Texas. The bacteria Burkholderia pseudomallei cause melioidosis, a condition that is difficult to diagnose and can be fatal.  The Georgia and Kansas patients died.
item.dc:creator: Walmart Recalls Better Homes and Gardens Essential Oil Infused Aromatherapy Room Spray with Gemstones Due to Rare and Dangerous Bacteria; Two Deaths Investigated

item.title: Design Within Reach Recalls Arc Collection Furniture Due to Violation of the Federal Lead Paint Ban (Recall Alert)
item.description: Surface paint on the furniture contain levels of lead that exceed the federal lead paint ban, posing a risk of lead poisoning. Lead is toxic if ingested by young children and can cause adverse health effects.
item.dc:creator: Design Within Reach Recalls Arc Collection Furniture Due to Violation of the Federal Lead Paint Ban (Recall Alert)

item.title: Meridian Furniture Recalls Ottomans Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The metal band at the base can contain sharp edges, posing a laceration hazard.
item.dc:creator: Meridian Furniture Recalls Ottomans Due to Laceration Hazard

item.title: Magnussen Home Recalls Nova Series 5-Drawer Chests Due to Tip-Over and Entrapment Hazards
item.description: The recalled chests are unstable if they are not anchored to the wall, posing tip-over and entrapment hazards that can result in death or serious injuries to children. The chests do not comply with the performance requirements of the voluntary industry standard ASTM F2057-19.
item.dc:creator: Magnussen Home Recalls Nova Series 5-Drawer Chests Due to Tip-Over and Entrapment Hazards

item.title: 5.11 Recalls Tactec Plate Carriers Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The cable in the quick release system of the plate carrier can separate from the handle preventing swift removal of the carrier in an emergency situation, posing an injury hazard.
item.dc:creator: 5.11 Recalls Tactec Plate Carriers Due to Injury Hazard

item.title: myCharge Recalls Powerbanks Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The powerbank’s lithium-ion battery can overheat and ignite, posing fire and burn hazards.
item.dc:creator: myCharge Recalls Powerbanks Due to Fire and Burn Hazards

item.title: Liberty Hardware Recalls Glass Cabinet Knobs Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The glass stem of the knobs can break during use, posing a laceration hazard.
item.dc:creator: Liberty Hardware Recalls Glass Cabinet Knobs Due to Laceration Hazard

item.title: KTM North America Recalls Off-Road Motorcycles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The retaining “R” clips on the front brake caliper pin can fall out, causing the front brakes to fail, posing a crash hazard to the rider.
item.dc:creator: KTM North America Recalls Off-Road Motorcycles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: Lightform Recalls LED Projectors Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The projector’s fan can malfunction and overheat, posing a fire hazard.
item.dc:creator: Lightform Recalls LED Projectors Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: Specialized Bicycle Components Recalls Tarmac SL7 Bicycles and Framesets Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The bicycle’s fork steerer tube can crack or break after harsh impact such as hitting a deep pothole or other stress event, posing fall and injury hazards to riders.
item.dc:creator: Specialized Bicycle Components Recalls Tarmac SL7 Bicycles and Framesets Due to Fall and Injury Hazards

item.title: Joovy Recalls Zoom 360 Ultralight Jogging Strollers Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The stroller’s front wheel bearing can fail or detach, posing a fall and injury hazard.
item.dc:creator: Joovy Recalls Zoom 360 Ultralight Jogging Strollers Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: ElliptiGO Recalls Arc Model Stand-Up Bicycles Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The bicycle frame can break while riding, posing fall and injury hazards to the user.
item.dc:creator: ElliptiGO Recalls Arc Model Stand-Up Bicycles Due to Fall and Injury Hazards

item.title: Hobby Lobby Recalls White Wood Stools Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The stools can break during use, posing fall and injury hazards.
item.dc:creator: Hobby Lobby Recalls White Wood Stools Due to Fall and Injury Hazards

item.title: Luyuan Recalls Youth All-Terrain Vehicles (ATVs) Due to Crash Hazard and Violation of Federal ATV Safety Standard
item.description: The youth ATVs fail to comply with the requirements of the federal mandatory ATV safety standard, including maximum speed limitations and other mandatory safety requirements for vehicles intended for children under 10 years of age. ATVs that fail to meet the mandatory safety requirements pose a risk of serious injury or death to children.
item.dc:creator: Luyuan Recalls Youth All-Terrain Vehicles (ATVs) Due to Crash Hazard and Violation of Federal ATV Safety Standard

item.title: Venom Motorsports Recalls Youth Model All-Terrain Vehicles (ATVs) Due to Crash Hazard and Violation of Federal Safety Standard; Sold Exclusively on VenomMotorsports.com
item.description: The Venom Motorsports youth model ATVs do not meet mandatory safety requirements, including speed restrictions, posing a risk of serious injury or death.  The ATVs also were imported and distributed in the U.S. without a Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC)-approved ATV Action Plan, which includes safety requirements designed to protect users.
item.dc:creator: Venom Motorsports Recalls Youth Model All-Terrain Vehicles (ATVs) Due to Crash Hazard and Violation of Federal Safety Standard; Sold Exclusively on VenomMotorsports.com

item.title: Kohl’s Recalls SONOMA Goods For Life Branded Ultimate Oversized Antigravity Chairs Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The chair can break or collapse when weight is applied, posing a fall hazard.
item.dc:creator: Kohl’s Recalls SONOMA Goods For Life Branded Ultimate Oversized Antigravity Chairs Due to Fall Hazard

item.title: Macy’s Recalls Martha Stewart Collection Oil & Vinegar Cruets Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The glass portion of the cruets can break during use, posing a laceration hazard.
item.dc:creator: Macy’s Recalls Martha Stewart Collection Oil & Vinegar Cruets Due to Laceration Hazard

item.title: Phoenix 200 All-Terrain Vehicles ATVs Recalled by Polaris Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The throttle speed control stop can break and become stuck, posing a crash hazard.
item.dc:creator: Phoenix 200 All-Terrain Vehicles ATVs Recalled by Polaris Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: The Boppy Company Recalls Over 3 Million Original Newborn Loungers, Boppy Preferred Newborn Loungers and Pottery Barn Kids Boppy Newborn Loungers After 8 Infant Deaths; Suffocation Risk
item.description: Infants can suffocate if they roll, move, or are placed on the lounger in a position that obstructs breathing, or roll off the lounger onto an external surface, such as an adult pillow or soft bedding that obstructs breathing.
item.dc:creator: The Boppy Company Recalls Over 3 Million Original Newborn Loungers, Boppy Preferred Newborn Loungers and Pottery Barn Kids Boppy Newborn Loungers After 8 Infant Deaths; Suffocation Risk

item.title: Huish Outdoors Recalls Oceanic Adult Dry Top Snorkels Due to Drowning Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Costco
item.description: The bottom purge valve on the recalled snorkels can leak, allowing unexpected water entry, posing a drowning hazard.
item.dc:creator: Huish Outdoors Recalls Oceanic Adult Dry Top Snorkels Due to Drowning Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Costco

item.title: Textron Specialized Vehicles Recalls PTV and Off-Road Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The parking brake catch bracket can wear out and cause the parking brake to fail, posing a crash hazard.
item.dc:creator: Textron Specialized Vehicles Recalls PTV and Off-Road Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: Harbor Freight Tools Recalls to Repair Propane Portable Heaters Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The fitting at the back of the heater can fail to be sufficiently tight, causing the heater to leak propane gas, posing a fire hazard.
item.dc:creator: Harbor Freight Tools Recalls to Repair Propane Portable Heaters Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: Gas One Recalls Propane Adapter Hoses Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The hose can swell during use causing gas to leak, posing a fire hazard.
item.dc:creator: Gas One Recalls Propane Adapter Hoses Due to Fire Hazard

item.title: Shower Benches Recalled Due to Fall Hazard; Made by Ivena and Sold Exclusively at Costco (Recall Alert)
item.description: The shower bench can collapse during use, posing a fall hazard to the user.
item.dc:creator: Shower Benches Recalled Due to Fall Hazard; Made by Ivena and Sold Exclusively at Costco (Recall Alert)

item.title: Vitus 14 and Vitus 16 Kids Bikes Recalled Due to Crash Hazard; Imported by Wiggle (Recall Alert)
item.description: The bicycles have handbrakes but no footbrakes. Federal regulations require the bicycles be equipped with both handbrakes and footbrakes. Sidewalk bicycles with handbrakes, but no footbrakes, may present a risk of injury to young children who might not be able to stop the bicycles using handbrakes only.
item.dc:creator: Vitus 14 and Vitus 16 Kids Bikes Recalled Due to Crash Hazard; Imported by Wiggle (Recall Alert)

item.title: Juratoys Recalls Children’s Shaving Toys Due to Violation of Federal Phthalate Ban
item.description: The brown trim of the shaving kit bags contains levels of a regulated phthalate that exceed the prohibition of specific phthalates. Banned phthalates are toxic if ingested by young children and can cause adverse health issues.
item.dc:creator: Juratoys Recalls Children’s Shaving Toys Due to Violation of Federal Phthalate Ban

item.title: Burley Recalls Ballz® QR Skewers Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The skewer, which connects the Coho XC Cargo Trailer to the bicycle, can shear or bend. This can cause instability of the trailer and the towing bicycle and pose a fall hazard for the bicycle rider.
item.dc:creator: Burley Recalls Ballz® QR Skewers Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: Step2® Recalls StepUp Sidekick Learning Towers™ Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The storage tray with cup holders and step can come loose from the tower, posing a fall hazard to the child.
item.dc:creator: Step2® Recalls StepUp Sidekick Learning Towers™ Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: PetSmart Recalls Top Paw Double Diner Dog Bowls Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The gasket on the bottom of the dog bowls can come off, leaving an unfinished edge, posing a risk of laceration.
item.dc:creator: PetSmart Recalls Top Paw Double Diner Dog Bowls Due to Laceration Hazard

item.title: SKE Outdoors Recalls Kids Bike Helmets Due to Risk of Head Injury
item.description: The bicycle helmets do not comply with the U.S. CPSC federal safety standard for bicycle helmets, posing a risk of head injury.
item.dc:creator: SKE Outdoors Recalls Kids Bike Helmets Due to Risk of Head Injury

item.title: Ryan and Rose Recalls Children’s Eating Utensils Due to Choking Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The handle of the Cutie Spoovel utensil can break off releasing small parts, posing a choking hazard for young children.
item.dc:creator: Ryan and Rose Recalls Children’s Eating Utensils Due to Choking Hazard (Recall Alert)

item.title: Razor USA Recalls GLW Battery Packs Sold with Hovertrax 2.0 Self-Balancing Hoverboards Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The lithium-ion GLW battery packs in the self-balancing scooters/hoverboards can overheat, posing a risk of the products smoking, catching fire and/or exploding.
item.dc:creator: Razor USA Recalls GLW Battery Packs Sold with Hovertrax 2.0 Self-Balancing Hoverboards Due to Fire Hazard

item.title: Wee Gallery Recalls Wooden Tray Puzzles Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The octopus and elephant puzzle pieces can break, posing a choking hazard to young children.
item.dc:creator: Wee Gallery Recalls Wooden Tray Puzzles Due to Choking Hazard

item.title: Infant Bath Seats Recalled Due to Drowning Hazard; Imported by Frieyss and Sold Exclusively on Amazon.com (Recall Alert)
item.description: The bath seats fail to meet the federal safety standard for infant bath seats, including requirements for stability and leg openings, and can tip over while in use, posing a drowning hazard to babies.
item.dc:creator: Infant Bath Seats Recalled Due to Drowning Hazard; Imported by Frieyss and Sold Exclusively on Amazon.com (Recall Alert)
